item.title: Justin Trudeau says he'll resign as prime minister of Canada
item.description: The development comes a month after Canada's deputy prime minister, Chrystia Freeland, resigned suddenly from Trudeau's cabinet.

item.title: Major winter storm covers 13 states, breaking snowfall records as it moves east
item.description: A major winter storm that has been breaking snowfall records in the Midwest is moving east, bringing with it a heavy mix of snow and ice.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
